document.full_text: an egyptian businessman and one-time head of a major egyptian bank has been charged with sexually assaulting a hotel maid at a luxury new york city hotel, police said.
document.title: egyptian charged with sex assault of ny hotel maid
lines_and_colors: an egyptian businessman and one-time head of a major egyptian bank has been charged with sexually assaulting a hotel maid at a luxury new york city hotel, police said.
